root: ^Iyo, are you ready yet? I agreed to give you a lift to that "best-sushi-bar-in-whole-Shibuya" of yours, but you seem to test my patience.

c-0: ^My patience! For god's sake, Iyo, if your partner tells you they won't put up with your terrible time-management skills, I don't know who will.

Ready: ^Finally. Don't forget to lock your office.
